description.en: A beautifully crafted cloak adorned with a symbol that represents the third Lunar Year. The third Lunar Year is dedicated to the Tiger.
description.ar: A beautifully crafted cloak adorned with a symbol that represents the third Lunar Year. The third Lunar Year is dedicated to the Tiger.
description.br: Uma capa lindamente trabalhada e adornada com um símbolo que representa o terceiro Ano Lunar. O terceiro Ano Lunar é dedicado ao Tigre.
description.cns: 一件做工精美的披风。披风的图案展示的是第三地支寅，该年的生肖为虎。
description.de: Trägt das Symbol zum Jahr des Tigers aus dem chinesischen Tierkreiszeichen. Erhöht die Stärke um acht.
description.fi: A beautifully crafted cloak adorned with a symbol that represents the third Lunar Year. The third Lunar Year is dedicated to the Tiger.
description.fil: A beautifully crafted cloak adorned with a symbol that represents the third Lunar Year. The third Lunar Year is dedicated to the Tiger.
description.fr: Une cape magnifiquement confectionnée, ornée d'un symbole qui représente la troisième Année Lunaire. La troisième Année Lunaire est dédiée au Tigre.
description.id: Jubah yang dibuat dengan indah dihiasi dengan simbol yang mewakili Lunar Year ketiga. Lunar Year ketiga ini didedikasikan untuk Harimau.
description.it: A beautifully crafted cloak adorned with a symbol that represents the third Lunar Year. The third Lunar Year is dedicated to the Tiger.
description.jp: 3番目の月の年を表すシンボルで飾られた美しく細工されたマント。旧正月は虎に捧げられます。
description.kr: 음력 3 년을 상징하는 상징으로 장식 된 아름답게 제작 된 망토. 음력 세 번째는 호랑이에게 바쳐집니다.
description.nl: A beautifully crafted cloak adorned with a symbol that represents the third Lunar Year. The third Lunar Year is dedicated to the Tiger.
description.pl: A beautifully crafted cloak adorned with a symbol that represents the third Lunar Year. The third Lunar Year is dedicated to the Tiger.
description.ru: Красивый плащ с символом третьего года китайского календаря - тигром.
description.sp: Una capa bellamente elaborada adornada con un símbolo que representa el tercer Año Lunar. El tercer Año Lunar está dedicado al Tigre.
description.sw: A beautifully crafted cloak adorned with a symbol that represents the third Lunar Year. The third Lunar Year is dedicated to the Tiger.
description.th: เสื้อคลุมที่ประดิษฐ์ขึ้นอย่างสวยงามประดับด้วยสัญลักษณ์ที่แสดงถึงปีจันทรคติที่สาม ปีจันทรคติที่สามอุทิศให้กับเสือ
description.tw: 象徵農曆生肖虎年的斗篷
description.vi: Một chiếc áo choàng được làm thủ công đẹp mắt với biểu tượng tượng trưng cho Tết thứ ba. Mùng 3 Tết dành riêng cho tuổi Dần.
